summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1969, for the improvement of the southeasterly one-half of Ravenna Place from Ravenna Boulevard to Fifteenth Avenue Northeast and Fifteenth Avenue Northeast between the southerly margin of Ravenna Boulevard and Ravenna Place, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, and by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon and wooden crosswalks, together with all appurtenances necessary for the proper surface drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 20374, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
